name: part_005
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Song performance of 'BLUE CLAPPER' by NePoLaBo.
MC section with NePoLaBo members introducing themselves and talking about the live performance.

subtitles.original: 取り寄せて
subtitles.english: Get it ready

subtitles.original: 美味しくマジェスティック
subtitles.english: Tasty and majestic

subtitles.original: 眠っても醒めても シンキングシンキング
subtitles.english: Whether asleep or awake, thinking, thinking

subtitles.original: 変えてみせる展示
subtitles.english: I'll change the display

subtitles.original: 踏み出すワンステップ
subtitles.english: Taking a first step

subtitles.original: 掴んでみせるよ キラキラ
subtitles.english: I'll grab it, sparkling

subtitles.original: マジ かなう日までストーリー 繋ぐ心
subtitles.english: Truly, a story until the day it comes true, connecting hearts

subtitles.original: さあ君に ずっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Now, because I want you to keep watching

subtitles.original: 手をあげて Clap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping the sound reaches you

subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.english: Look, all together

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping it echoes all around

subtitles.english: Light shining on our future

subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 今日は要らないブレーキ
subtitles.english: No need for brakes today

subtitles.original: 一斉号砲はステイキング
subtitles.english: The simultaneous starting signal is staking

subtitles.original: 何時でもいいでしょう 四六時中
subtitles.english: Any time is fine, all day and night

subtitles.original: 君は何をフィーリング
subtitles.english: What are you feeling?

subtitles.original: 解き放つスパークリング
subtitles.english: Releasing the sparkling

subtitles.original: 暗闇に放つレーザービーム
subtitles.english: Releasing a laser beam into the darkness

subtitles.original: 輝かせてステージ 作るから
subtitles.english: I'll make the stage shine

subtitles.original: さあ君に もっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Now, because I want you to watch even more

subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping the sound reaches you

subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping it echoes all around

subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 重なるウェーブ 世界を揺らせ
subtitles.english: Overlapping waves, shake the world

subtitles.original: DJ POLKA Yo!
subtitles.english: DJ POLKA Yo!

subtitles.original: DJポルカここに参上
subtitles.english: DJ Polka is here

subtitles.original: 盛り上がってけ この最上
subtitles.english: Get excited, this is the best

subtitles.original: 愛をもっとくらわそう
subtitles.english: Let's give even more love

subtitles.original: 上を向いてぶち上がろうぜ
subtitles.english: Look up and let's go crazy

subtitles.original: 不安があることくらい既に I know
subtitles.english: I already know that there's anxiety

subtitles.original: でもまだまだ泳ぎ足りないな
subtitles.english: But I still haven't swum enough

subtitles.original: Give me crazy まるでLazy
subtitles.english: Give me crazy, just like lazy

subtitles.original: 次元混ざり合うのすべて塗り替えるBLUE
subtitles.english: Dimensions mixing, repaint everything BLUE

subtitles.original: 手をあげて Clap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, to the other side of the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 音届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping the sound reaches you

subtitles.original: 手をたたこう 手をたたこう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Look, all together

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap your hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, to the other side of the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 響き渡りますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, hoping it echoes all around

subtitles.original: 手をたたこう 手をたたこう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光射す僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: Light shining on our future

subtitles.original: ハイ！ ハイ！ ハイ！ ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで！ イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Alright! Here we go! Yay!

subtitles.original: コンネネ、コンポル、コンラミ、コンばんわんだばだー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Kon-Nene, Kon-Pol, Kon-Lamy, Kon-Banwandabada! Yay!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ・サマー2022、みんな楽しんでるかーい！？
subtitles.english: Hololive Summer 2022, is everyone having fun!?

subtitles.original: 楽しんでるかーい！？ 楽しんでるかーい！？
subtitles.english: Are you having fun!? Are you having fun!?

subtitles.original: もっともっと声出して、もっともっと声出して！はいはいはいはい！
subtitles.english: Speak up more, speak up more! Yes yes yes yes!

subtitles.original: はい！公式チャンネルということでね、簡単に自己紹介していきましょう。
subtitles.english: Alright! Since we're on the official channel, let's do some quick introductions.

subtitles.original: はい、ねぽらぼの「ね」からいきましょう。
subtitles.english: Alright, let's start from the "Ne" of NePoLaBo.

subtitles.original: はーい！ねぽらぼの「ね」、桃鈴ねねです！
subtitles.english: Haaai! The "Ne" of NePoLaBo, Momosuzu Nene here!

subtitles.original: はい！ねぽらぼの「ぽ」、尾丸ポルカです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Alright! The "Po" of NePoLaBo, Omaru Polka here! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: はい！ねぽらぼの「ら」、雪花ラミィです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Alright! The "La" of NePoLaBo, Yukihana Lamy here! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: はい！ねぽらぼの「ぼ」、獅白ぼたんです！
subtitles.english: Alright! The "Bo" of NePoLaBo, Shishiro Botan here!

subtitles.original: ということで、はい、私たちで『BLUE CLAPPER』をお送りしましたー！
subtitles.english: And with that, yes, we performed "BLUE CLAPPER"!

subtitles.original: どうだったー！？これもう絶対盛り上がる！私たちが歌って盛り上がらないわけがない！
subtitles.english: How was it!? This is definitely exciting! There's no way it wouldn't be exciting when we sing it!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がらなかったことはない！これを私たちが歌って盛り上がらないわけがない！んだよねー！
subtitles.english: It's never not been exciting! There's no way it wouldn't be exciting when we sing it! Right!

subtitles.original: あ、でもその前に、えーっとうちらが歌った前にドリーミングデイズ組が歌ってたやん。
subtitles.english: Ah, but before that, um, before we sang, the Dreaming Days group was singing.

subtitles.original: よかったねー、先輩たち可愛かったねー！
subtitles.english: That was great, the seniors were so cute!

subtitles.original: あの可愛いのね、あのちょこ先がちょっと先生だからさ本当に。練習の時もさ先生がさ、こうやって。
subtitles.english: That cuteness, Choco-sen is really like a teacher. Even during practice, the teacher was like this.

subtitles.original: 「みんな、ハイ！」みたいな感じでやってた。
subtitles.english: She was doing things like, "Everyone, high!"
